convertNexusToApePhylo: function

collection: phylogenies

Overview

Convert a nexus string to an ape phylo object. NOTE: not needed for reading in trees, Arbor can do this automatically. This function is only needed for certain workflows where one step returns a Nexus string.

Example

Arguments

  • nexusTree: An input phylogenetic tree in nexus format.

Outputs

  • tree: A tree in ape phylo format.

References
